header.title: FRIENDLY FIRE: THE NRA’S SCHOOL-SAFETY PLAN

title: FRIENDLY FIRE: THE NRA’S SCHOOL-SAFETY PLAN
content:
Leave it to the NRA to solve America’s gun problem with … more guns. <!--more--> In the aftermath of the Sandy Hook Elementary School massacre, the NRA proposes schools have armed guards (and even administrative personnel and teachers) with firepower to stop mass killers.
No need for worrisome debates and legislation, the NRA says, schools can enact their specially-designed counteroffensive right away.
Leid Stories reads between the lines of the NRA’s plan and deciphers what the gun lobby really wants.
Plus, updates on what’s not happening in Congress with the so-called fiscal cliff.
